segments.text: Can we talk about the working overtime issue ? What â€™ s on your mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sure . To be honest , nobody would like to work overtime . However , we have to if it is necessary for our company . I would do that if it is the call of duty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Glad to hear that . Generally , it is 2 to 3 hours more than your working hours .
segments.speaker: S1
